Detailed Description

Simple state machine. Does nothing but publishing it's states.

Author
Tobias Holst
Version
1.1.1

Definition at line 109 of file statemachine.cpp.

bool Tapi::StateMachine::smCall ( tapi_lib::GetStateMachine::Request &  smReq,
tapi_lib::GetStateMachine::Response &  smResp 
)
private

alled by a ros callback when a new call on its GetStateMachine service has been got. Responds with the available states

Parameters
smReqRequest of the service call (should be a true to get a response)
smRespResponse of the service call, includes all available states
Returns
true if the request was ok and a response was sent, false if not
